title: [BUG] Wrong rendering in Linux container
body:
### Description

We use Neodynamic library to generate labels - https://www.neodynamic.com/products/printing/thermal-label/sdk-vb-net-csharp/
I reported issue to Neodynamic with wrong rendering their NativePrinterFonts when running microservice in docker Linux environment. Please see the attached example with the difference when running onprem in Windows environment (left label) versus running in docker Linux environment (right label).

Neodynamic's response: _The font glyphs are the same on both, now why under Linux the rendering seems to not be as good as under Windows it's something outside our scope. The rendering part is performed by the SkiaSharp dependency._ 

Could you please take a look at this and fix the rendering in a Linux environment?
